bizModel.ListSQL: select * from (select fe.*,b._AutoID InstanceId from T_FEE_EXPENSE_INVOICE fe left join dbo.T_E_WF_Instance b on fe._AutoID=b.AppID) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select top 1 _AutoID ID,item_comment,item_code,ishavaitem,sub_item_id,item_id,acct_sub,acct_commnet,acct_sub from fee_fee_item where item_type=@itemtype
TableScript.ScriptNote: 根据类型查询出费用项
自动生成日常报销单据号

TableScript.ScriptTxt: update T_FEE_FEE_ITEM_EXPENSE set BudgetType='@type' where _MainID=(select _AutoID from T_FEE_EXPENSE_INVOICE where APP_NO='@appNo') and LINE_NO='@lineNO'
TableScript.ScriptNote: 更新预算项目的预算类型

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select * from t_ysitems where IsLast=1 and _UserName='@userName'
TableScript.ScriptNote: 获取可选择的预算项目

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select COUNT(1) from T_FEE_FEE_ITEM_EXPENSE where _MainID=(select _AutoID from T_FEE_EXPENSE_INVOICE where APP_NO='@appNO')and BudgetItemCode <>'' and BudgetItemCode is not null
TableScript.ScriptNote: 查询指定申请单号是否含有预算项目
获取之前还款的总金额

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select top 1 attribute1 from OA_PUB_FLEX_VALUE_IFACE where FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME='PKUPH_DEP' and FLEX_VALUE=(select CostCode from dbo.T_E_Org_Department where DeptCode='@deptcode')
TableScript.ScriptNote: 从EBS表查询申请科室是行政管理类还是临床服务类
插入出纳付款审批意见
获取合同信息（用于打印）

bizModel.ListSQL: select * from (select ID,a.contract_application_sn,a.contract_no,case a.contract_fee_type when 0 then '医院付款' when 1 then '医院收款' when 2 then '无经济条款' end as contract_fee_type,b.data_value, a.contract_name,a.application_name,a.contract_application_date,a.contract_update_date from CONTRACT_APPLICATION a left join T_Base_Data b on a.contract_category=b.BASEDATA_ID where b.data_Type='CONTRACT_CATEGORY' and b.STATES=1 and a.approve_status in (5,21,51)) t where |^condition^|

select b.APP_NO,b.PAY_METHOD,b.REASON,b.MONEY,b.EMP_ID from T_FEE_EXPENSE_BORROW b inner join T_FEE_EXPENSE_BORROW_DETAIL d on b._AutoID=d._MainID where STATUS='已付款' and |^condition^| order by APP_NO desc
